title: Baker CEO says 2025 resilience driven by AI growth, sees oil investment slowdown
description: Baker Hughes CEO Lorenzo Simonelli said on Friday the global macro environment remains resilient through 2025, despite geopolitical and policy headwinds, supported by the rapid deployment of generative artificial intelligence driving power demand and industrial activity.
content:
Simonelli said the company remains confident of reaching $1.5 billion in data center orders ahead of its original three-year target as it continues to see strong momentum in data center power demand.

title: Google's new deal with Anthropic increases potential for more TPU clients: HSBC
description: Google's (GOOG)(GOOGL) freshly inked deal to supply Anthropic (ANTHRO) with up to 1M of its in-house Ironwood TPUs for artificial intelligence applications opens the door for more such agreements in the future, according to HSBC.

title: SRMIST holds national symposium on artificial intelligence

title: DOST harmonizes datasets for responsive, science-based, inclusive public service

description: When it comes to getting rich, Kevin O’Leary doesn’t believe the formula has changed much, even in the age of artificial intelligence.

title: Energy Secretary Chris Wright Proposes Changes to Power American Manufacturing, Lead AI Innovation
description: Energy Secretary Chris Wright on Friday directed FERC to initiate a rulemaking to accelerate American manufacturing and ensure that the United States continues to lead in artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Two federal judges say use of AI led to errors in US court rulings
description: Two federal judges admitted their staff used artificial intelligence to help prepare recent court orders that were called error-ridden.
content:
Two federal judges admitted in response to an inquiry by U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley that members of their staff used artificial intelligence to help prepare recent court orders that Grassley called "error-ridden."

description: Artificial intelligence is making its presence felt in the creative realm of Indian cinema. The fraternity remains divided on its potential, with one side viewing it as a creative force, the other side as a disruptive one

title: Envision Energy Honored with "AI for Sustainability Excellence" at Reuters Global Sustainability Awards 2025
description: LONDON, Oct. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Envision Energy, a global leader in green technology, has been honored with top recognition at the Reuters Global Sustainability Awards 2025, winning the 'AI for Sustainability Excellence' category for its pioneering application of artificial intelligence in driving the global energy transition.
